scenario_text.value: How goes it, Takuma? Have you found Kaito?

Nope. We haven’t found a single clue,
unfortunately.
So you’re waiting here on standby?

I would feel terrible if he came back and
there was no one here.
I thought you went to the shrine.

You’re always trying to investigate the
shrine, after all!
Haha, I did think about it, to be honest.

But staying here seems best for now. Although
it is embarrassing, as the only adult.

Somebody had to do it. So I accepted it as my
role to stay and await your good news.

I’ll keep an eye on things and if needs be, go
to the radio tower. You search for Kaito.
